ygData.subject: Re: Virus spreading has NO place anywhere
ygData.msgSnippet: Once you reach lvl 29, I believe your guildmaster will have it available to learn, before that, you just need to find someone who s already learned it and hope
ygData.messageBody:
Once you reach lvl 29, I believe your guildmaster will have it available to
learn, before that, you just need to find someone who's already learned it
and hope they will teach it to you. It will probably be quite expensive to
learn though, usually a trade in runes is required. That's how I learned
and that's my price for teaching ;) I'm on the Tarew Marr server, if you
are also on the same server, give me a tell ;)

Talarin Kal'Amon, High Elven Wizard


----- Original Message -----
From: William Greene <wrg@...>
To: <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, May 17, 1999 11:44 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Virus spreading has NO place anywhere


> From: "William Greene" <wrg@...>
>
> Yeah lets put this matter behind us and work on research folks. Thats why
I
> am having my mailbox filled with this mail.
>
> Anyone know how or where i might begin to learn Elder Dragon?
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Eric Morris <killag@...>
> To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
> Date: Monday, May 17, 1999 11:11 AM
> Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Virus spreading has NO place anywhere
>
>
> >From: "Eric Morris" <killag@...>
> >
> >Is this a mailing list on flaming spammers and newbies or on sharing info
> on
> >spell research? Tell me now so I can get off of this list if need be.
> >
> >
> >----- Original Message -----
> >From: Eric Fulton <efulton@...>
> >To: <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
> >Sent: Monday, May 17, 1999 9:43 AM
> >Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Virus spreading has NO place anywhere

> >> From: Eric Fulton <efulton@...>
> >>
> >> I have another one, I have received something in the excess of
> >> 50 emails from a cristie@.... This constitutes spam. Try
> >> postmaster@...
> >>
> >>
> >> > Content-Length: 1189
> >> > Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit
> >> > X-MIME-Autoconverted: from quoted-printable to 8bit by
> >efulton-sun.us.oracle.com id HAA06460
> >> >
> >> > From: "McCartney, Michael R" <Michael.McCartney2@...>
> >> >
> >> > I just did also. Thank you for the email info Christie.
> >> >
> >> > Drev
> >> >
> >> > > ----------
> >> > > From: Cristie[SMTP:cristie@...]

> >> > > Sent: Sunday, May 16, 1999 9:12 AM
> >> > > To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
> >> > > Subject: [EQ_spell_research] Virus spreading has NO place anywhere
> >> > >
> >> > > I am also going to write to a few folks on this matter.> There is
> >always someone to mail to ... anyone else who received this should
probably
> >write to abuse@..., I seriously doubt bellsouth is going to be
> >happy about one of their users sending e-mail attachments containing
> >viruses. Its too damn bad. I've already mailed mine off to bellsouth..
who
> >else will follow suit. He will likely lose his internet account at least
> >with this isp.
> >> > >
